overall_assessment: The sector is currently at an emerging digital maturity level, with most businesses lacking a robust online presence and digital skills.
key_insight: There is a significant opportunity for the sector to improve its digital capabilities through collaborative learning and shared resources, particularly in social media and collective marketing.

recommendations.title: Peer Learning Workshops for Digital Skills
recommendations.description: Organize regular workshops focused on enhancing digital skills, particularly in social media marketing and website management. These workshops can help businesses learn from each other and build a supportive community.
recommendations.approach: Utilize local venues to host workshops led by knowledgeable sector members or external facilitators. Encourage participants to share experiences and practical tips.
immediate_actions: Set a schedule for monthly workshops in central locations.
Invite local digital experts or tech-savvy artisans to lead sessions.
Create a WhatsApp group for ongoing support and sharing of resources.
recommendations.long_term_vision: In 1-2 years, businesses will have improved their digital skills, leading to increased online engagement and sales.
recommendations.who_leads: Local sector associations and development partners.

recommendations.title: Collective Marketing Campaign
recommendations.description: Develop a shared marketing initiative that highlights the crafts and artisan products of the sector, leveraging collective branding to enhance visibility and sales.
recommendations.approach: Form a marketing committee within the sector association to coordinate promotional activities, such as joint events or social media campaigns.
immediate_actions: Conduct a brainstorming session to create a unified brand message.
Design promotional materials that showcase all artisans together.
Plan a launch event to unveil the campaign to the community and potential customers.
recommendations.long_term_vision: Within 1-2 years, the sector will have a recognized brand presence, leading to increased customer interest and sales.
recommendations.who_leads: Sector associations with support from local businesses.
recommendations.estimated_reach: All 11 businesses can participate in the campaign.

recommendations.title: Creation of a Shared Online Marketplace
recommendations.description: Establish a collective online marketplace where artisans can list their products, increasing their digital presence and accessibility to customers, both locally and internationally.
recommendations.approach: Collaborate with local tech partners to develop a simple e-commerce platform. Involve artisans in the design to ensure it meets their needs.
immediate_actions: Identify a local tech partner willing to assist with platform development.
Gather input from artisans on desired features and products to include.
Launch a pilot version of the marketplace with a few selected artisans.
recommendations.long_term_vision: In 1-2 years, the marketplace will be operational with multiple artisans contributing, leading to increased sales and customer reach.
recommendations.who_leads: A consortium of artisans with support from local NGOs and tech partners.
recommendations.estimated_reach: Potentially all 11 businesses plus new entrants.

recommendations.title: Establish Sector-wide Best Practices
recommendations.description: Develop a set of best practices for digital marketing and product presentation that all members can adopt, fostering a consistent and professional sector image.
recommendations.approach: Host collaborative sessions to compile insights and experiences that lead to the creation of a best practice guide for the sector.
immediate_actions: Facilitate discussions among artisans to identify effective strategies and challenges.
Draft a simple guideline document based on shared experiences.
Share the guidelines via WhatsApp and during workshops.
recommendations.long_term_vision: In 1-2 years, the sector will present a unified and professional image online, attracting more customers.
recommendations.who_leads: Sector associations with input from all artisans.

recommendations.title: Formation of a Digital Mentorship Network
recommendations.description: Create a mentorship network where more digitally savvy artisans can guide those with limited skills, fostering a culture of support and knowledge sharing.
recommendations.approach: Pair experienced digital users with those seeking to improve their skills, facilitating one-on-one learning and support.
immediate_actions: Identify artisans with digital skills willing to mentor others.
Match mentors with mentees based on needs and skills.
Organize monthly check-ins for mentors and mentees to share progress.
recommendations.long_term_vision: In 1-2 years, a culture of peer support will be established, leading to improved digital capabilities sector-wide.
recommendations.who_leads: Local sector associations to facilitate the matching process.
recommendations.estimated_reach: At least 5-6 businesses directly benefiting from mentorship.
